title: The restorative power of medical tattoos | Becky Barker
itunes:author: Becky Barker
description: Tattoos can transform and empower people, with some seeking them out to reconnect with their bodies due to scarring, physical abnormalities or the aftermath of a procedure or illness. Paramedical tattooist Becky Barker shares the art and craft of medical tattooing, explaining how this expansive field helps improve the quality of life for breast cancer survivors -- and anyone looking to renew themselves in ways that are more than skin-deep.
itunes:subtitle: The restorative power of medical tattoos | Becky Barker
